title: Is there any way to lock the toolbar?
content:
Hello, I am wondering if there is any way to lock the toolbar so that it does not automatically pop up when you are in full screen mode and hover over the top area of the screen. I cannot easily play some browser games because they must be full screen and the toolbar popping up continuously interrupts the game.

To clarify, I do not want the toolbar to always be there; locking the toolbar so that it automatically shows when in full screen is not the solution I am looking for. I want the toolbar to disappear when I am in full screen and not popup when I hover over the top area of the screen.

Thank you for any help!
creator: hayley.a.echard

title: Passkey Support
content:

title: My VPN Interferes with Firefox
content:
I just updated my macbook to the most recent OS, and since updating, and updating both Firefox and my VPN (PIA VPN), firefox has ceased loading pages while my vpn is active. It's not my internet connection, as other internet applications like Discord, Steam, and Spotify have continued to work while the VPN is active with no issue. This problem only seems to be affecting, and therefore must be the result of, something wrong with Firefox.

I tried rebooting my computer, which briefly worked but after a short while, opening new tabs or navigating links on webpages stopped working again fairly quickly. When I try to open a new webpage the loading symbol appears over the tab icon for a split second and then vanishes, the webpage remaining the same; and when trying to open links in a new tab they do not load and the little "lock" symbol in the search bar appears crossed out, indicating the browser is not establishing a secure connection. 

I tried just restarting the app itself, using troubleshooting mode, and clearing my cache as well, but every one hit the same dead end.

Does anyone have a fix for this?
creator: adriometer
